.. _`art_profiler_illumina`:

ART_PROFILER_ILLUMINA
=====================

Use the art profiler to create a base quality score profile for Illumina read data from a fastq file.





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule art_profiler_illumina:
        input:
            "data/{sample}.fq",
        output:
            "profiles/{sample}.txt"
        log:
            "logs/art_profiler_illumina/{sample}.log"
        params: ""
        threads: 2
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-212-g458009d7/bio/art/profiler_illumina"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
